text:
Caller: Our agents can't see call recordings on Meranti CC Lite.
Agent: CC Lite doesn't include call recording. Pro tier required.

User: We exceeded WhatsApp quota.
Agent: Kapok Omni Plus includes tier-1 quota only. For higher tiers, contact sales for add-on.

Caller: Do you support SSO on Raintree UC?
Agent: Yes, optional SSO is available on Raintree UC plan.
